author: bampakoa
message:
docs: update Aristeidis Bampakos bio (#44410)
PR Close #44410

files.patch:
@@ -134,7 +134,7 @@
     "picture": "aristeidis.jpg",
     "twitter": "abampakos",
     "website": "https://medium.com/@abampakos",
-    "bio": "Aristeidis is a web development team lead at Plex-Earth working with Angular. He is a co-organizer of the Angular Athens meetup and the author of Learning Angular - 3rd Edition and Angular Projects - 2nd Edition books. He is also a senior Angular instructor at Code.Hub where he teaches the Angular framework to other developers.",
+    "bio": "Aristeidis is a web development team lead at Plex-Earth working with Angular. He is the author of two books about Angular: Learning Angular - 3rd Edition and Angular Projects - 2nd Edition. He also works as an Angular senior tech instructor at Code.Hub where he teaches the Angular framework to other developers and professionals.",
     "groups": ["GDE"]
   },
